recordLookups.name: Get_Service_Request_Associated_with_Handover_Detail
recordLookups.label: Get Service Request Associated with Handover Detail

textTemplates.name: NEWHOABOOKINGEMAIL
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!FullName},

Thank you for confirming your Home Orientation appointment.

We are pleased to inform you that your Home Orientation is scheduled for:
Date: {!BookingDateDisplay}
Time: {!EnquirySlot}
Location: {!Get_HOA_Service_Appointment.Street}, {!Get_HOA_Service_Appointment.City}, {!Get_HOA_Service_Appointment.Country}
How to get there: {!Get_HOA_Service_Appointment.Street}, {!Get_HOA_Service_Appointment.City}, {!Get_HOA_Service_Appointment.Country}
Reference number: {!BookingRefNumber}

Your Handover Executive
Your Handover Executive, {!HA_NAME}, will be your dedicated guide during the Home Orientation. They can be contacted on {!HA_Mobile_Number}, {!HA_Email_Address}.

The Handover Executive will reach out to you, a day before your Home Orientation Day, to remind you of your appointment.

What To Expect
To help you make the most of your first visit to your new home and community, we have prepared a set of guidelines to ensure a smooth and comfortable Home Orientation experience.

Here is what you can expect during the orientation process:

  1. A detailed walkthrough of your new home's unique features.
  2. Identification of any potential snags and a resolution timeline.
  3. Understanding your new community and the services and amenities available.

For your information:

  1. It is advisable that only the owner, and those named on the Sales Agreement, should attend the appointment.
  2. Please bring your Emirates ID card or any other form of identification along with you on the day of your appointment.
  3. For safety reasons and due to potential ongoing construction, we advise wearing comfortable flat shoes while touring your home and surrounding areas.
  4. Once the orientation is complete, the Handover Executive will go through any points raised by you, before asking you to sign the report which will then be emailed to you.
  5. You will be offered a community tour and introduced to the facilities and amenities available to you.
  6. Once the appointment has come to an end, the Handover Executive will let you know the next steps in the lead up to key handover day.

Please be informed, in the event you do not show up for the appointment or do not reschedule, then Aldarâ€™s representative will carry out the orientation on your behalf and send you a detailed snagging report.

To reschedule or cancel your appointment please call us on 800ALDAR (25327).

We look forward to welcoming you to your new home!

Kind regards,

Aldar Customer Care

 
 
 

800 ALDAR   |   ALDAR.COM

textTemplates.name: RescheduledHOABookingEmail
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!FullName},

To reschedule or cancel your appointment please call us on 800ALDAR (25327).

We look forward to welcoming you to your new home!

Kind regards,

Aldar Customer Care

 
 
 

800 ALDAR   |   ALDAR.COM

value.stringValue: Confirmation: Your Aldar Home Orientation Date for {!$Record.UnitName__c}
